ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors thank Dr. Alexandre Gomes da Silva for the plant material collection ( in memoriam). This study was financed in part by the Fundação de Amparo à Ciência e Tecnologia do Estado de Pernambuco - FACEPE (Grant no. APQ-1067-4.03/15) and by the Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior - Brasil (CAPES) (Finance Code 001).
